extends Object
implements scala.Product, scala.Serializable
    :: DeveloperApi :: This is used by the node id cache to find the child id that a data point would belong to.

      • updateNodeIndex

        public int updateNodeIndex(int[] binnedFeatures,
                  Bin[][] bins)
        Determine a child node index based on the feature value and the split.
        Parameters:
        binnedFeatures - Binned feature values.
        bins - Bin information to convert the bin indices to approximate feature values.
        Returns:
        Child node index to update to.
